title: 开服后出现不在白名单内【如图】
author: ︶ㄣ独醉ゝ
txt_content:

replies.author: xianren66
replies.txt_content:
︶ㄣ独醉ゝ 发表于 2020-1-28 19:54
后台无限【INFO】【G_ClientTcpConnectionHandler】failed to Establish Connection to the cloud! 没办 ...
这个我不懂。可以试试二楼的办法。
1.关服
2.找到server.properties并打开
3.找到white-list
4.把=后面改成false5.保存并重开服

replies.author: xianren66
replies.txt_content:
